forum.name: guide
forum.description: the anyland guide with faq, frequently asked questions and their answers! help along, wiki style!

thread.title: changing all colors in the area

comments.text: you can set the global light color by opening your area dialog (the mountain icon), picking the color brush, and painting the 3rd shape from the top (a cube).
you can remove its light and color again by painting it black.

thread.latestCommentText: you can remove its light and color again by painting it black.
